ygData.subject: Re: anyone playing ac
ygData.msgSnippet: 5 words: Lag, lag, lag, ugly graphics. AC is very solo oriented so for those that like to solo in EQ or can t play for extended time, it s the game for you,
ygData.messageBody:
5 words: Lag, lag, lag, ugly graphics.

AC is very solo oriented so for those that like to solo in EQ or can't play
for extended time, it's the game for you, though turbine has to work on the
combat engine and reduce the massive lag the bloody game has.

Freddy Cheng wrote:

> From: "Freddy Cheng" <sccheng@...>
>
> anyone going to try ac... let me know... ive setup some mailing list
> thing... so u guys might be intersted... also.. can someone post in the
> internet mailing list?
>
> cheers,
> Fred
